---

externalDocs:

paths:

    get:
      description: foo
      summary: foo
      operationId: foo
      responses:
        200:
          $ref: "./components/response1.yaml"
        300:
          $ref: "./components/response2.yaml"
  /bar:
    get:
      description: bar
      summary: bar
      operationId: bar
      responses:
        200:
          $ref: "./components/response1.yaml"
